data.title: This is the first letter writing to Priyanka from this application.
data.body: This body is going to be short at first, unfortunately I have been pestered all morning about this. I have some more features of this website almost ready, they aren't perfect yet so they are currently disabled. I think you are going to like this, honey. This way we can archive our messages and everytime you are on this website you are interacting with my mind. Also, I will be setting up Google Analytics to this site so I can make statistical representations of how often you use this.

data.title: Letter number 2
data.body: This will be filled out by tonight, so you can keep checking it as the time goes on. I don't have time with my parents right now to write this. I hope you will enjoy
